body:
I made a video talking about my channel. its 2 minutes only and not so long, so please watch it

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W9aLPJWi7Go&feature=youtu.be

the video is basically talking about what content i should upload to my channel and what changes should be made.
after watching it please write your opinions here:

http://goo.gl/forms/RkT58detoVpE42r72


thanks!
